title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Prediction (1 point)

· Cells will reproduce/grow

· Cultures will grow

· Bacterial population will increase in size

· Untransformed cells will not reproduce/grow

Justification (1 point)

· Expression of the tet-resistance gene

· Synthesis of tet-resistance protein
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

Prediction (1 point)

· Cells will reproduce/grow

· Cultures will grow

· Bacterial population will increase in size

· Untransformed cells will not reproduce/grow

Justification (1 point)

· Expression of the tet-resistance gene

· Synthesis of tet-resistance protein

The student response earns one of the following points:

Prediction (1 point)

· Cells will reproduce/grow

· Cultures will grow

· Bacterial population will increase in size

· Untransformed cells will not reproduce/grow

Justification (1 point)

· Expression of the tet-resistance gene

· Synthesis of tet-resistance protein

The student response earns two of the following points:

Prediction (1 point)

· Cells will reproduce/grow

· Cultures will grow

· Bacterial population will increase in size

· Untransformed cells will not reproduce/grow

Justification (1 point)

· Expression of the tet-resistance gene

· Synthesis of tet-resistance protein

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Identification (1 point)

· make an X in the area within the kan gene or kan promoter

Justification (1 point)

· They must not have had an intact kan gene/promoter

· The human DNA disrupted the kan gene/promoter
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

Identification (1 point)

· make an X in the area within the kan gene or kan promoter

Justification (1 point)

· They must not have had an intact kan gene/promoter

· The human DNA disrupted the kan gene/promoter
